title: DirectX Error

embed.description: Gyazo lets you instantly grab the screen and upload the image/GIF to the web. You can easily share them on Chat, Twitter, Blog, Tumblr, etc. Available for Windows, Mac and Linux.

body: This message will randomly appear when I try to join some games. Some games will start and this wont happen, but then randomly i'll try to join a game and the LoL client will crash and this message will appear. I have checked and my graphic drivers are updated, and i've done all Windows Updates. Does anyone have any idea on how I can fix this? I'm getting Leaver Buster for it because I have to restart my PC every time this shows up to join a game. {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
Perhaps also try reinstalling your display drivers and directx as well.
I recommenced this program to remove them http://www.guru3d.com/files-details/display-driver-uninstaller-download.html 
It's relatively simple to do, follow the instructions from that website.

Note which graphics card you have (if you have one) for example nvidea, and get Nvidea  Geforce experience to re-install the driver you need.

If your not sure which driver you may need you can get driver searches to see such as driver navigator.

Good luck!

-Conrad.
